Package org.example.timetracker.Repositories

Interface UsersRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Long>
@Repository @EnableAspectJAutoProxy public interface UsersRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>
This interface represents a repository for managing user data. It extends the CrudRepository interface to provide basic CRUD operations. The repository is annotated with @Repository and @EnableAspectJAutoProxy.

    • existsByEmail

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE email = :email") boolean existsByEmail(String email)
      Checks if a user with the specified email exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user to check
      Returns:
      true if a user with the email exists, false otherwise

    • findByEmail

      @Query("SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE email = :email AND user_Id != :id") Long findByEmail(long id, String email)
      Finds a count of users with specified email and with other id`s.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to exclude from the search
      email - the email of the user to find
      Returns:
      the ID of the user with the specified email

    • save

      @Modifying @Query("INSERT INTO user (username, email) VALUES (:name, :email);") boolean save(String name, String email)
      Saves a new user to the database with the specified name and email.
      Parameters:
      name - the username of the user
      email - the email of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully saved, false otherwise

    • updateUserByUserID

      @Modifying @Query("update user set username = :name, email = :email where user_id = :id ") boolean updateUserByUserID(Long id, String name, String email)
      Updates a user's information in the database by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to update
      name - the new username of the user
      email - the new email of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully updated, false otherwise
